content: meri hood with 4mm needles 60-80cm cable is best cast on 45 stitches using the long tail cast on row 1 wrong side purl all stitches row 2 right side knit all stitches knit in stockinette stitch repeat row 1 and 2 until your work measures 20cm ending on the wrong side break yarn and turn your work so the right side faces you leave the 45 stitches on the needles with the same needles pick up stitches from the right side starting on the right edge the pick-up rate is 2 stitches for every 3 row that means pick up 2 stitches from 2 row and skip one when you reach the end knit the stitches on your needles and continue picking up stitches from the left edge the edges should have the same number of stitches i picked up 40 stitches from the right edge knit the 45 stitches on the needles and 40 stitches from the left edge so in total you should have 125 stitches continue working in stockinette stitch until your work from the picked up edge measures 22 cm you can shorten or elongate this part if you want a tighter or looser fit keep in mind that the yarn estimates change end your work on the wrong side ribbing with 3 75mm needles 40cm cable is best start your ribbing 1k 1p when you reach the end of the round cast on 7 new stitches and place a beginning of the round marker don t turn your work instead start working in rounds when the ribbing is 8 cm you can bind off using a regular bind-off method or an italian bind off for a more stretchy finish tie with a 4 mm crochet hook and just the dk yarn make a chain that s at least 80cm long slip_stitch into every chain to make it sturdier if you don t like crochet you can do an i-cord tie edge for the tie with 3 5mm needles 40cm cable is best pick up stitches starting on the right edge of the hood the rate is 2 stitches for every 3 row when you reach the top part where you cast on stitches pick up every stitch 45 stitches on the left side pick up 2 stitches for every 3 row again on the bottom part pick up every stitch 7 stitches and place a beginning of the row marker in total you should have 149 stitches knit 3 row in the round on the fourth row knit until you have 7 stitches left cast off 2 stitches knit 2 stitches cast off 2 stitches and knit one stitch on the fifth row knit until you have 7 stitches left cast on 2 new stitches knit 2 cast on 2 more stitches knit one knit 5 more row place the tie through the holes and hold it in place when you start casting off so you don t have to arrange it later continue
